articles.title: Far Cry 4 Now Finally Runs at 60fps On PlayStation 5 - IGN
articles.description: 11 years after its debut, Far Cry 4 now runs at 60 frames per second (fps) on PlayStation 5.

articles.title: As Days Gone gets its PS5 remaster, it's only right that it gets a critical reevaluation too - Eurogamer
articles.description: Days Gone finally gets a native PS5 re-release, complete with some enhancements, so we ask if the game got judged too harshly on its initial release.

articles.title: BMW Defends the M2 Race Car's Four-Cylinder Engine - Motor1.com
articles.description: BMW tells Motor1 why the new M2 Racing had to have a smaller 2.0-liter, four-cylinder engine instead of the road car's 3.0-liter inline-six.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (3) is ‘100%’ coming to the United States, Carl Pei says - 9to5Google
articles.description: According to Carl Pei, the Nothing Phone (3) is "100%" coming to the United States, suggesting it won't be sold in a "beta program."

articles.title: Deal: Google Pixel 9 plummets to its all-time low price - Android Authority
articles.description: The Google Pixel 9 is at its record-low price, making it a great choice for those who want a premium phone that won't break the bank.

articles.title: WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers launches July 24 - Gematsu
articles.description: WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and Microsoft Store on July 24 for $49.99 / £44.99 / €49.99, publisher 505 Games and develop…
